articles.headline: Poland urges Brussels to probe TikTok over AI-generated content
articles.summary: Poland has requested an investigation from the European Commission into TikTok for hosting AI-generated content that allegedly includes calls for the country to withdraw from the EU, which officials believe is likely Russian disinformation.

articles.headline: Musk's xAI buys third building to expand AI compute power
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI has acquired a third building to enhance its AI computing capabilities, signaling a significant investment in artificial intelligence infrastructure.

articles.headline: SoftBank completes $41 billion investment in OpenAI, deepening bet on AI
articles.summary: SoftBank has finalized its $41 billion investment in OpenAI, marking a substantial commitment to the future of artificial intelligence technology.

articles.headline: How AI shook the world in 2025 and what comes next
articles.summary: A comprehensive analysis of the transformative impact of artificial intelligence throughout 2025 and predictions for its future developments.

articles.headline: How Microsoft is betting on AI agents in Windows, dusting off a winning playbook from the past
articles.summary: Microsoft is reintegrating AI agents into Windows, reviving a strategy that once made its operating system dominant, as it seeks to adapt to the current tech landscape.

articles.headline: Crush explores how gravity shapes life as we know it
articles.summary: James Riordan’s new book will help readers wrap their heads around this mysterious, fundamental force of nature.

articles.headline: Science taught us a few new tricks about our pets in 2025
articles.summary: New insights into pet behavior and care have emerged from recent scientific studies.

articles.headline: These medical breakthroughs and advances gave patients new hope in 2025
articles.summary: A review of significant medical advancements that have improved patient care and treatment options this year.

articles.headline: Even One Drink a Day May Raise Mouth Cancer Risk
articles.summary: New research suggests that even light alcohol use may carry serious risks, linking one drink a day to a higher risk of mouth cancer.

articles.headline: Scientists Turn Carrot Waste Into Protein People Prefer
articles.summary: Researchers have developed a method to convert carrot processing leftovers into a nutritious protein source using edible fungi.

articles.headline: New England Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs denies accusations of assault and strangulation
articles.summary: Stefon Diggs faces serious legal challenges as he denies allegations of assault and strangulation, which have surfaced recently.

articles.headline: Father of NASCAR driver Denny Hamlin dies after house fire, mother critically injured
articles.summary: Tragedy strikes as Denny Hamlin's father passes away in a house fire, while his mother suffers critical injuries.

articles.headline: Drew Brees, Larry Fitzgerald lead Pro Football Hall of Fame modern-era finalists
articles.summary: The list of modern-era finalists for the Pro Football Hall of Fame includes notable names like Drew Brees and Larry Fitzgerald.

articles.headline: Chock, Bates go 'all in' for Olympic gold as Milano-Cortina could be last Games
articles.summary: Madison Chock and Evan Bates are focusing on winning Olympic gold at the upcoming Milano-Cortina Games, potentially their last Olympics.

articles.headline: Egypt's Sobhi sentenced to a year in prison in academic fraud case, media reports
articles.summary: Egyptian soccer player Sobhi has been sentenced to a year in prison following an academic fraud case, according to media reports.
